attributes.action: reconition for the late simon chase in afghan who died protecting a dutch diplomat
attributes.additional_details:
We are looking for the late simon chase to recognised for his bravery as he sadly died while protecting a female dutch diplomat in kabul  afghanastan while working for private security firm  on 17th january 2014.
Simon was ex army who started his military career with the Cheshire Regiment before transfering to serve the rest of his army career with 4th Battalion Royal Irish Regiment.
Simon was a family man and was engaged to his fiancee Norma and has two young sons.
Please sign and show our hero how much we are proud of the work he carried out
